product_name: Polar Polar Insulated Bottle - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: The Polar 20 fl. oz. insulated bottle keeps beverages ice cold during long, hot bike rides or hikes. Double-wall construction provides an insulating thermal layer while a foil layer within the walls reflects solar heat away. Just fill up the Polar bottle with water and ice and hit the trail or road. Dripless, no-mess valve is easy to clean; simply twist and pull. Wide diameter opening ensures easy filling and cleaning; easy-to-grip top and bottom. Fits into standard cycle bottle cages. 100% BPA free.
